name: mazpaijo/flysystem
description: Filesystem abstraction: Many filesystems, one API.

suggest.Mazpaijo/flysystem-rackspace: Allows you to use Rackspace Cloud Files
suggest.Mazpaijo/flysystem-azure: Allows you to use Windows Azure Blob storage
suggest.Mazpaijo/flysystem-webdav: Allows you to use WebDAV storage
suggest.Mazpaijo/flysystem-aws-s3-v2: Allows you to use S3 storage with AWS SDK v2
suggest.Mazpaijo/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Allows you to use S3 storage with AWS SDK v3
suggest.spatie/flysystem-dropbox: Allows you to use Dropbox storage
suggest.srmklive/flysystem-dropbox-v2: Allows you to use Dropbox storage for PHP 5 applications
suggest.Mazpaijo/flysystem-cached-adapter: Flysystem adapter decorator for metadata caching
suggest.ext-ftp: Allows you to use FTP server storage
suggest.ext-openssl: Allows you to use FTPS server storage
suggest.Mazpaijo/flysystem-sftp: Allows you to use SFTP server storage via phpseclib
suggest.Mazpaijo/flysystem-ziparchive: Allows you to use ZipArchive adapter
